name: Still Waiting Discord
description: Discord bot that automatically reminds mentioned users who haven't replied or reacted within 24 hours, keeping conversations active across servers.
achievements: Developed publicly available Discord bot with automated mention tracking and reminder system deployed across multiple servers
Implemented privacy-focused architecture storing only essential metadata (user/message/channel IDs, timestamps) with automatic deletion post-reminder
Built scalable infrastructure using GCP VM + Firestore with IPv4/IPv6 compatibility and comprehensive test coverage
